SELECT A.DDL_COL_ID ,A.DDL_COL_PNM ,A.DDL_COL_LNM ,A.DDL_TBL_ID ,A.COL_ORD
, CASE WHEN A.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN A.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(A.DATA_TYPE, '(', A.DATA_LEN, ', ', A.DATA_SCAL, ')' ) ELSE CONCAT(A.DATA_TYPE, '(', A.DATA_LEN, ')') END ) END AS DATA_TYPE ,A.DATA_LEN ,A.DATA_SCAL ,COALESCE(A.PK_YN, 'N') AS PK_YN ,A.PK_ORD ,COALESCE(A.NONUL_YN, 'N') AS NONUL_YN ,A.DEFLT_VAL ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,A.RQST_DTL_SNO ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,A.RQST_DTM ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,A.APRV_DTM ,A.APRV_USER_ID ,GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM ,GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM ,B.DDL_TBL_PNM ,B.DDL_TBL_LNM ,B.SCRT_INFO FROM WAH_DDL_COL A INNER JOIN WAH_DDL_TBL B ON A.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_TBL_ID = #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY COL_ORD, A.DDL_TBL_ID, A.DDL_COL_PNM

select A.* ,GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM ,GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM from WAH_DDL_COL A where A.DDL_COL_ID = #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.OBJ_VERS = #{objVers}
